data.what_is:
Insightly Marketing is marketing automation made simple. It is built on the same platform as Insightly CRM, so customer data flows freely between the two systems in real time, giving you and your teams access to actionable insights faster than ever. It has a beautiful, easy-to-use interface for creating customer journeys, email templates, customer newsletters and shareable dashboards. Build engaging campaigns and grow a pipeline to support sales, all in minutes.

Align sales and marketing efforts with a single, unified view of the customer across all marketing and sales touchpoints.  Your teams will be empowered to create, maintain, and measure the impact of your sales and marketing efforts with common definitions across key components of the customer lifecycle, including prospects, leads, opportunities, pipeline stages, go-to-market strategies, and more.

Grow sales pipeline through engaging customer journeys and intelligent audience segmentation and targeting.  Score prospect interactions and deliver on high quality leads to sales, creating velocity through the sales process and driving higher conversion rates.   
Measure and Report on Marketing Impact through visibility to key metrics through the entire marketing and sales funnel, including open and click through rates, page views, visitor sources, time spent on site, MQL to SQL conversion, and marketing campaign return on investment (ROI).  Drive ongoing business success with A/B and multivariate testing capabilities.
Optimize Customer Retention through a unified, high definition view of your customers over time.  Use data on customer behavior to build nurture campaigns that encourage adoption and usage, create upsell and cross-sell opportunities, solicit voice-of-the-customer feedback, and build triggered campaigns to proactively drive renewals and repeat business.
data.product_description:
Insightly Marketing is marketing automation made simple. It is built on the same platform as
Insightly CRM, so customer data flows freely between the two systems in real time, giving you
and your teams access to actionable insights faster than ever. It has a beautiful, easy-to-use
interface for creating customer journeys, email templates, customer newsletters and shareable
dashboards. Build engaging campaigns and grow a pipeline to support sales, all in minutes.
data.supported_languages: German, English, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish

pricing_plans.plan_description: For small businesses who think big. Engage customers with essential email and marketing automation functionality built on the same database and platform as your CRM.
For seasoned pros and growing teams. Use behavior-based analytics and prospect tracking to nurture and engage buyers with the right message at the right time.

For big teams with limitless potential. Leverage unlimited forms, landing pages, and real-time insights to capture the data and insights required to scale your business. Then, transform that data in real time using calculated fields, or execute custom functions when records are created or updated.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
Insightly Marketing really takes the weight of our shoulders when it comes to managing the database and integrating with our native suite options which is why we find it perfect.

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
The UI is sometimes slow at times and it affects our productivity and moreover there is no presence of tolerance trigger feature which is very important and they should push this update to make this product better.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previously, it was really a hard nut to crack as we had to use multiple platforms but not anymore as insightly gives us all critical insights into our marketing campaigns and spends along with the intuitive CRM which makes our work easier.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: Insightly Marketing really takes the weight of our shoulders when it comes to managing the database and integrating with our native suite options which is why we find it perfect.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: The UI is sometimes slow at times and it affects our productivity and moreover there is no presence of tolerance trigger feature which is very important and they should push this update to make this product better.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Previously, it was really a hard nut to crack as we had to use multiple platforms but not anymore as insightly gives us all critical insights into our marketing campaigns and spends along with the intuitive CRM which makes our work easier.

initial_reviews.review_title: Incredible new capabilities but could use better organization
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
I love the new capabilities that we have in Insightly Marketing. The email templates and creation are incredible, and we make great use of the journeys fuction.

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
Both Insightly CRM and Marketing can run quite slowly sometimes, but we have noticed that Marketing is even slower. Additionally, I would love to be able to better organize our emails so we don't get overwhelmed. For example, if we could put them in a category that would appear on the sidebar.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
As I mentioned, the better email capabilities and the journeys have helped with our sales outreach and prospect priority. It is giving us much clearer data and insights into how our outreach is performing and converting to sales.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: I love the new capabilities that we have in Insightly Marketing. The email templates and creation are incredible, and we make great use of the journeys fuction.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: Both Insightly CRM and Marketing can run quite slowly sometimes, but we have noticed that Marketing is even slower. Additionally, I would love to be able to better organize our emails so we don't get overwhelmed. For example, if we could put them in a category that would appear on the sidebar.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: As I mentioned, the better email capabilities and the journeys have helped with our sales outreach and prospect priority. It is giving us much clearer data and insights into how our outreach is performing and converting to sales.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Good Tool for Small to Large Sales Teams
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
Some of the best features of Insightly marketing for our team were:
- Customer Data Management
- Connect Projects to People
- Automate Reminders for Subsequent Actions
- Monitor Emails
- Make Reports

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
The tool should have some auto sync features. At the similar price, this tool only offers a part of what other marketing automation tools are offering. Searching is difficult, and the CRM is also minimal.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
In our team, Insightly marketing is used to manage all client information, relationships, and proposal phases. It is primarily used by the client representative and project management teams. It assists us in managing our proposals.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: In our team, Insightly marketing is used to manage all client information, relationships, and proposal phases. It is primarily used by the client representative and project management teams. It assists us in managing our proposals.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good for Automating your routine tasks
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
This tool is great as it is not industry dependent , neither it has rigid scope for things. One can easily customise it according to their business needs and manouvre there way

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
There are few things which can be improved as there are very limited scope and less inbuilt integration with other apps. It sometimes requires help of a coder or IT person to achieve few things

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insightly Marketing is one of the best tools that make automating marketing processes a breeze. This tool not only helps in creating complex customer journeys but aids in informed decision making

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: This tool is great as it is not industry dependent , neither it has rigid scope for things. One can easily customise it according to their business needs and manouvre there way

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: There are few things which can be improved as there are very limited scope and less inbuilt integration with other apps. It sometimes requires help of a coder or IT person to achieve few things

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Insightly Marketing is one of the best tools that make automating marketing processes a breeze. This tool not only helps in creating complex customer journeys but aids in informed decision making

initial_reviews.review_title: I mean, what is there to say really?
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
Unfortunate, there is nothing I could say it does well other than send out email blasts, though those can also be challenging.

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
The tool does 1/3rd of what other marketing automation tools do, at the same cost. The CRM is also bare bones. Searching is challenging, reporting usually requires downloading to Excel and piecing things together, and data syncing is not the norm. It feels like the last option.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
It houses our customer data and allows us to view that alongside our internal metrics, which are pushed into custom fields. It's a central place for many departments to view info.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: Unfortunate, there is nothing I could say it does well other than send out email blasts, though those can also be challenging.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: The tool does 1/3rd of what other marketing automation tools do, at the same cost. The CRM is also bare bones. Searching is challenging, reporting usually requires downloading to Excel and piecing things together, and data syncing is not the norm. It feels like the last option.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It houses our customer data and allows us to view that alongside our internal metrics, which are pushed into custom fields. It's a central place for many departments to view info.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
I was facing to generate quality leads and conversions for my company. Then I tried to do my marketing with a third party. So I chose INSIGHTLY MARKETING and they proved themself and gave me high-quality marketing. Highly Recommended.

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
I have not found anything I dislike about Insightly Marketing.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insightly Marketing solved my problems by providing my company with excellent leads and conversions on a perfect budget.

inefficient, there are gaps in integrations that I wish were better

initial_reviews.review_title: The perfect, easy to use and affordable CRM and automated cold emailing tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
It is easier to use than competitors like mailchimp, it is still largely affordable, and the functionality is far expanded compared to other available products in the market.

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
The dashboard view at the moment is not the most intuitive. The UI is still not as professional and grasping as others. While the product is promising more efforts needs to go in the UI to make its adoption go up.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Insightly allowed me to send out emails to large number of potential customers with interactive HTML content, it also allowed me to keep track of the clicks, incidence rates among other things .

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: It is easier to use than competitors like mailchimp, it is still largely affordable, and the functionality is far expanded compared to other available products in the market.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: The dashboard view at the moment is not the most intuitive. The UI is still not as professional and grasping as others. While the product is promising more efforts needs to go in the UI to make its adoption go up.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Insightly allowed me to send out emails to large number of potential customers with interactive HTML content, it also allowed me to keep track of the clicks, incidence rates among other things .

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
I like the Journey function.  It automates a path that I want to put clients upon, bringing consistency to the process.  The Journey also tells me who is and who is NOT engaging, so I don't have to keep track of these details manually

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
The templates function is not immediately intuitive.  Once somebody showed me it was OK, but still it should be easier to use.
Setting  up the Journey and testing the Journey were a workout.

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Main problems being solved:
1.   Consistency of messaging to all clients going through a process
2.  Keeping track of client engagement automatically

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: I like the Journey function.  It automates a path that I want to put clients upon, bringing consistency to the process.  The Journey also tells me who is and who is NOT engaging, so I don't have to keep track of these details manually

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer:
The templates function is not immediately intuitive.  Once somebody showed me it was OK, but still it should be easier to use.
Setting  up the Journey and testing the Journey were a workout.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Main problems being solved:
1.   Consistency of messaging to all clients going through a process
2.  Keeping track of client engagement automatically

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use, full of functionality
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Insightly Marketing?
Email templates in Mktg and tracking/statistics

What do you dislike about Insightly Marketing?
the price jump from professional to enterprise

What problems is Insightly Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used to use a very clunky system and since implementing Insightly, we can create emails, journeys, workflows, etc. so quickly and easily. It's perfect for non-tech and tech people to use. Also, the technical and customer support is excellent.

We used to use a very clunky system and since implementing Insightly, we can create emails, journeys, workflows, etc. so quickly and easily. It's perfect for non-tech and tech people to use. Also, the technical and customer support is excellent.
